equalOpportunity.title: Welcome to Our Employment Application
equalOpportunity.subtitle: Equal Opportunity Employer Statement
equalOpportunity.statement: This hotel is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer committed to excellence through diversity. Employment offers are made on the basis of qualifications, and without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. This hotel will make reasonable efforts to accommodate persons with disabilities. This hotel is a Violence and Drug Free workplace.

conviction.title: Conviction & Driving (MVR) Record
conviction.notice: A CONVICTION AND/OR MOVING VIOLATION(S) ON YOUR DRIVING AND/OR CRIMINAL RECORD, WILL NOT NECESSARILY RESULT IN THE DENIAL OF EMPLOYMENT
conviction.applicantNotice: All employment offers are contingent upon the results of specified background checks, including criminal records. A conviction will not necessarily result in a denial of employment as the details of the conviction(s) will be considered as it relates to the job for which you have applied. You will be notified if the information obtained from a criminal records check (conviction) will result in an adverse employment action. Background checks will be conducted according to federal, state and local guidelines.
conviction.doNotList: Do not list arrests that did not result in a conviction. Do not list convictions that are sealed, annulled, expunged and/or pardoned.

voluntaryIdentification.title: Voluntary Self-Identification
voluntaryIdentification.header: {{propertyName}} and its affiliates is an Equal Opportunity Employer. As required by law, we must record certain information to be made a part of our Affirmative Action Program.
voluntaryIdentification.invitation: Applicants for employment are also invited to participate in the Affirmative Action Program by reporting their status as disabled, disabled veteran, veteran of the Vietnam era or other minority.
voluntaryIdentification.notice: In extending this invitation you are also advised that: (a) workers (applicants) are under no obligation to respond, but may do so in the future if they choose; (b) responses will remain confidential within the Human Resources Department; and (c) responses will be used only for the necessary information to include in our Affirmative Action Program. We are a company that values diversity. We actively encourage women and minorities to apply.
voluntaryIdentification.refusal: REFUSAL TO PROVIDE THIS INFORMATION WILL HAVE NO BEARING ON YOUR APPLICATION AND WILL NOT SUBJECT YOU TO ANY ADVERSE TREATMENT.

reviewConsent.title: Review & Consent
reviewConsent.description: Review your application and provide consent
reviewConsent.readAndInitial: READ AND INITIAL THE STATEMENTS BELOW ACKNOWLEDGING THAT YOU UNDERSTAND
reviewConsent.certification1: I hereby certify that the facts set forth in the above employment application, and any attachments, are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and authorize {{propertyName}} to verify their accuracy and to obtain reference information on my work performance and education. I hereby release {{propertyName}} from any/all liability of whatever kind and nature which, at any time, could result from obtaining and having an employment decision based on such information. I understand that, if employed, falsified statements of any kind or omissions of facts called for on this application shall be considered sufficient basis for dismissal
reviewConsent.certification2: I understand that should an employment offer be extended to me and accepted that I will fully adhere to the policies, rules and regulations of employment of the Employer. However, I further understand that neither the policies, rules, regulations of employment, or anything said during the interview process shall be deemed to constitute the terms of an implied employment contract. I understand that any employment offered is for an indefinite duration and 'At Will' and that either I or the Employer may terminate my employment at any time with or without notice or cause.
reviewConsent.certification3: I am aware that this hotel may require a post-offer drug and alcohol screening, and background investigation including criminal record and credit history (for specific positions), all in accordance with applicable federal, state, & local laws. I agree to undergo the required investigation and screening, if requested. Also, I am aware that future screening & investigations may be required.
